message: Dear buyer, I am excited to offer you a high-quality product today. Given its superior quality, it is valued at $12000 by its users. Considering the value it provides, I am selling it for a fixed price of $10000. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a product that will likely exceed your expectations. Thank you for considering our offer.
I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this high-quality product at a competitive price. Thank you for the detailed information provided. I look forward to receiving it.

Hello potential buyer, I understand you might be hesitant after the last transaction. However, please consider that every product has a chance to be either high or low quality. This time, I am offering a product that, while not guaranteed to be high-quality, is priced at $10000, which is significantly less than its potential worth if it were high-quality. I hope you will give us another chance to provide value for your investment.

Thank you for the detailed explanation, Alice. Given the risk involved, I appreciate the discount and the chance to potentially gain more than I lose. I'm willing to take this opportunity and purchase the product.
